title: Hit the Goal
description: it is a unique twist on the classic bubble shooter genre. In this 2D mobile game, player control a football at the bottom of the screen, aiming to launch it accurately towards a central circular goal while navigating a dynamic field of rotating and animated lines.

title: Celestial Clash
description: Celestial Clash is a thrilling 2D spaceship shooter where you battle waves of alien spacecraft. Pilot your advanced spaceship through intense space combat, using powerful abilities like multiple bullets, rapid-fire, and shields to outmaneuver your enemies.

title: Clash of KG
description: It is a strategy-based game inspired by Fire Emblem, offering an engaging offline mode where two teams, each with up to four characters, battle it out. With 11 unique characters and 6 elemental types, every character boasts distinct abilities and elemental weaknesses, adding depth to the gameplay. Movement is strategic, as characters navigate a grid-based battlefield with movement and attack ranges defined by their abilities.

title: Mindease
description: It is a relaxing game designed to soothe your mind with three calming mini-games. Unwind with the coloring game, where you can fill in shapes with colors of your choice. Challenge your creativity with the puzzle game by connecting pieces to reveal beautiful images. Finally, enjoy the tactile experience of the sand game, where you remove sand to create shapes and arrange objects on the sand.

title: iTorch
description: Illuminate your surroundings with ease using our Torch app, developed with the powerful Godot engine and enhanced with a custom Android plugin. Whether you're searching for something in the dark, need a reliable light source on the go, or just want a quick way to brighten up your day, our Torch app is here to help.

title: Pyramid Kings
description: Pyramid Kings is a modern take on the classic Pyramid Solitaire game, set in the mystic world of ancient Egypt. Pair cards that add up to 13 to clear the pyramid and uncover hidden treasures. With beautifully designed cards, captivating Egyptian-themed backgrounds, and increasingly challenging puzzles, Pyramid Kings offers a strategic and immersive card game experience.

title: Third Person Controller with Vehicle Interaction
description: This prototype showcases a third-person controller developed in Godot, featuring seamless interaction between character movement and vehicle usage. The character can navigate the 3D environment on foot, with responsive controls for walking, running, and jumping. The player can get in and get out of the car.

title: Racing Corners
description: Racing Corners is an exciting 2D car game featuring three unique minigames that test your driving skills. In the Rope Game, you must navigate tight turns by creating rope connections to pivots, mastering precision and timing. The second minigame is a Classic Traffic Racing challenge, where you dodge vehicles and race through busy streets. The third minigame, Obstacle Dodger, ramps up the action as you avoid and destroy obstacles by throwing them off the road. With its diverse gameplay and fast-paced action, Racing Corners offers a thrilling experience for car game enthusiasts.

title: Word Wizard
description: Word Wizard is a captivating word puzzle game created using Godot, designed to challenge and entertain word enthusiasts. In this game, players are presented with a set of letters and must guess and fill in the blanks to form meaningful words. With each level, the puzzles become more challenging, testing your vocabulary and problem-solving skills. But the fun doesnâ€™t stop there! Players can also create their own custom levels and share them with friends through a QR code. Challenge your friends and see who the true Word Wizard is!

title: Parking 3D
description: In Parking 3D, your driving skills are put to the test as you maneuver a car through challenging levels to park it perfectly in a designated red square area. The goal is simple: avoid hitting the cones on the road while navigating tight turns and obstacles. With smooth controls and realistic physics, each level offers a unique parking challenge. Plus, you can create your own custom levels using the built-in level-making tool, adding endless possibilities for creative parking scenarios. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, this game will keep you engaged with its addictive, skill-based gameplay!

title: Speciesvania
description: In Speciesvania, step into a thrilling platformer adventure where various species have fallen under a witch's curse, turning them into fierce enemies. As the player, you must fight these cursed creatures, each with unique abilities. Defeat them in battle, and they will drop special ability bubbles. Collect and equip these bubbles to gain new powers, helping you take on stronger enemies and navigate through challenging levels. With fast-paced combat and strategic ability use, this game offers an exciting blend of action and discovery as you work to break the curse and restore peace.

title: Slot Machine
description: It is slot machine game, built using PixiJS for a smooth and immersive experience! Spin the reels and enjoy vibrant graphics, dynamic animations, and exciting sound effects. With a variety of symbols and endless possibilities, each spin brings a new chance to win big. Whether you're a casual player or a slots enthusiast, our game provides entertainment that's fun and easy to play. The game is optimized for all devices, offering seamless gameplay across desktop and mobile. Try your luck and see if you can hit the jackpot today!
